bibl.title: The Ptolemaic Royal Image and the Egyptian Tradition.
'Never Had the Like Occurred': Egypt's View of its Past
bibl.author: ASHTON, Sally-Ann

bibl.note: Investigates the possibility that similarities between the Egyptian and the Ptolemaic royal imageries were a deliberate attempt by the later rulers to associate themselves with their predecessors.
ASHTON Sally-Ann, The Ptolemaic Royal Image and the Egyptian Tradition.
John TAIT (Ed.), 'Never Had the Like Occurred': Egypt's View of its Past = Encounters with Ancient Egypt (London, 2003) pp. 213-223, 3 figg.
